name: Super Villain War: Lost Heroes
description:
STRATEGIZE your battles, CAPTURE your enemies and BUILD a city full of VILLAINS!
Years ago, a sudden monster invasion caused the world disaster and resources became scarce. People fought and stole from each other to survive, and soon the lands were full with lawless villains.
As the boss of your city, you must recruit villains, capture the enemies and strategize your fight to conquer the world!

- BATTLE FORMATION
Plan your villain formation to change the outcome of the battle!

- CAPTURE and PERSUADE
Capture your enemies and take them to your prison!
Persuade the prisoners and make them your ally!!

- COLLECT VILLAINS
Over 120 villains to collect and evolve!
All Attack, Defense and Support type villains are going to be crucial in battle!!

- CITY DEVELOPMENT
Develop your city buildings and increase your resource production rate!
Protect your city by leveling up your Defense Turret and Guardian Stone!!

- GUILD BATTLE
Join a guild and conquer the battlefield against others!
Loot the enemy guild and steal their resources!!

- EQUIPMENT and SKILLS
Over 800 gears and 400 skills to enhance and upgrade!

- FULL OF CONTENTS
Raid battles, Colosseum, Tower of Another Realm and many more content to look forward to!


~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~
● Free to play Strategy RPG
● Plan your formation to win the battle
● Collect and evolve unique villains
● Capture enemies and persuade them to be your ally
● Develop your city to increase productivity
● Protect your city by leveling your turrent and barrier
● Join a guild and conquer the battlefield
● Gather and upgrade various gear and skills
